channel.title: Comments on: Google News style floating sidebar
channel.description: The Development Blog of Gabe Shackle

item.title: By: Karl Rosaen
item.dc:creator: Karl Rosaen
item.description:
Thanks for posting your findings on this effect, I was just recently wondering about it.
One word of caution, it might be worth using a timer to check the scroll event instead of using a window.scroll event listener directly as recommended by John Resig in his <a href="http://ejohn.org/blog/learning-from-twitter" rel="nofollow">post about how twitter became slow.</a>
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for posting your findings on this effect, I was just recently wondering about it.

One word of caution, it might be worth using a timer to check the scroll event instead of using a window.scroll event listener directly as recommended by John Resig in his post about how twitter became slow.
